http.title: Broadstraik Inn, Aberdeenshire, Scottish Country Pub
http.html:
Opening HoursTerms
  • Home
  • Our Menu's
  • Events & Functions
  • Drinks, Wines & Bar Snacks
  • Location & Contact

Broadstraik Inn, Aberdeenshire, Scottish Country Pub

The Broadstraik is everything a true Scottish Country Pub should be. Mixing old and new, and constantly evolving with a basic philosophy at the heart of it all – to offer excellent  wine & beer with great service in a relaxed, friendly atmosphere.

 

Our pub  is located in the heart of the North East of Scotland, 8 miles/20 minutes drive west of Aberdeen in the village of Elrick, on the outskirts of Westhill. Surrounded by a landscape of rolling hills and forests, it lies midway between the beautiful Royal Deeside & Cairngorms region and the stunning coastline of the North East.

Latest News

Christmas and Hogmanay bookings now being taken! ..more

enquiries@broadstraikinn.co.uk The Broadstraik Inn, Elrick, Westhill, Aberdeenshire, AB32 6TL
